mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(STATS_SKILL_DATA SYS_C0031835)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM STATS_SKILL_DATA ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME
SELECT CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPION_KR_NAME, WINRATE, PICKRATE, BANRATE, COUNTER1, COUNTER2, COUNTER3 FROM ${tier}_DETAIL WHERE LANE = #{lane} AND PICKRATE!=0 AND WINRATE !=0
SELECT CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM BRONZE_DETAIL WHERE LANE = #{lane} AND PICKRATE > 0 ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME
SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(STATS_SKILL_DATA SYS_C0031835)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM STATS_SKILL_DATA WHERE CHAMPIONID = #{championId} ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME
